Translations.Text: Alm
Day $ilen imdanen a ten ooen qqaoen: "numen", u nitni ur ppuhewwlen
Ni$ Nhewwel wid i ten id izwaren. War ccekk, ad Yissin Oebbi wid iqqaoen tidep, ad Yissin ikeddaben
Ne$ $ilen ad a£ zwiren wid ixedmen tucmitin? Dir it wayen peuddun
Win iggunin timlilit akked Oebbi, s tidep, a d ias, war ccekk, lajel n Oebbi. Neppa, Issel, d Amusnaw
Win ijuhden, ijuhed kan i iman is. Oebbi, s tidep, ur Iewao ara imavalen
Wid iumnen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan, war ccekk, ad asen Nekkes tucmitin nnsen, a ten Nkafi $ef wayen xeddmen ifuqen
Nweuua amdan ar lewqama, s imawlan is. Ma lezmen fellak, ad iyI tcarkev ayen ur tessinev, ur asen ppa$ awal. Tu$alin nnwen, $uoI. Ad awen Mle$ acu txeddmem
Wid iumnen, ixedmen ayen ilhan, war ccekk, a ten Nessekcem ar iaaoviyen

Ger imdanen, wid iqqaoen: "numen s Oebbi". Ma meenen, deg ubrid n Oebbi, ad eesben ahewwel n medden, d aaaqeb n Oebbi. Mi d iusa l$elb, s$uo Mass ik, ar ad inin: "ih, nella yidwen". Day ur Ieoa ara Oebbi, i illan deg idmaren imavalen
War ccekk, Oebbi Issen wid iumnen, Issen ixabiten
Nnan wid ijehlen, i wid iumnen: "ddut d ubrid nne$, a nbibb tuccva nnwen". Nitni ur pbibbin acemma, si tuccva nnsen. S tidep, nitni d ikeddaben
War ccekk, ad bibben tiaekkwmin nnsen, akked tiaekkwmin nniven. Ih, ad ppusteqsin, ass n tnekra, af wayen id snulfuyen
Ni$ Nuzen ed Nue, i ugdud is. Izde$ yides, agim kkes ed smuset iseggwasen. Ibbwi ten ueemmal, nitni d imednas
Nsellek it, neppa akked wid iddan di lbabuo. Nerra t d assekni i imavalen
Iboahim, mi inna i ugdud is: "aabdet Oebbi, eezzbet aS. Yif it wakka, i kunwi, lemmer teeoim
Taabdem kan tiaancuoin, war Oebbi. Tesnulfam d tikerkas. Ih, wid taabdem, war Oebbi, ur zmiren a kwen $iten. Ssutret l$it i Oebbi, aabdet eP, snemmret aS. £uoeS ara tu$alem
Ma tnekoem, ihi, uqbel nnwen, nekoen leoyus". I iwatan, i umazan, siwa assiwev ubeggen
Day ur walan ara, amek id Inezzu Oebbi lxelq, sinna, Ippales as. Ih, ayagi, i Oebbi, d ushil
Ini: "iniget di tmurt, walit amek id Inza lxelq. Sinna, Oebbi a d Iawi lxelq aneggaru. Ih, Oebbi Izmer i yal cci
Ikkat win i S ihwan; Ipeunu $ef win i S ihwan. £ureS jebbu nnwen
Ur tesfunnugem, kunwi, di tmurt, ne$ deg igenni. Ur tesaim, war Oebbi, bab ne$ asettao
Wid iugin issekniyen n Oebbi, akked temlilit yideS, widak ad aysen aeunu W. I widak, aaaqeb aqeoean
Tiririt n ugdud is, siwa mi d nnan: "en$et ep, ne$ sseo$et ep". Isellek it Oebbi, si tmes. Deg waya, s tidep, d assekni i ugdud iumnen
Inna: "teddmem kan tiaancuoin, war Oebbi. Temeemmalem di tmeddurt n ddunit, sinna, ass n tnekra, kra degwen ad nekoen wiyav, kra ad xzun wiyav. Axxam nnwen d times, ur awen illi usellak
